name: Super Goatron (RGCD C64 16KB Compo Entry)
description:
Super Goatron is a RGCD C64 16KB Cartridge Game Dev Compo Entry.

Shoot enemies, shoot bonus items, shoot walls. Shoot em aaalll.. 

Code : Mika "Misfit" Keränen

Art: Mika "Misfit" Keränen

Audio: Mika "Misfit" Keränen

Important stuff: TFW8B

(pihsrow eht taog)
